Melee Weapon Attack:
 +6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 
Hit:
 7 (2d6) piercing
damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. The target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 14
(4d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Medium swarm of Tiny beasts, unaligned

The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a
Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

name: Swarm of Poisonous Snakes
